t, p = input().lower(), 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz|'[int(input())]
print(''.join(i.upper() if i < p else i for i in t))

s, x = input().lower(), int(input())
print(''.join(ch.upper() if ord(ch) < x + 97 else ch.lower() for ch in s))

text = input().lower()
caps = int(input())+97
for letter in text:
	print(letter.upper(), end='')if letter < chr(caps) else print(letter, end='')
print()

a, s = input().lower(), int(input())
print(''.join(t.upper() if ord(t) < s + 97 else t.lower() for t in a))

s = input().lower()
k = int(input())
result = ''.join(c.upper()
                 if ord(c) < k+97
                 else c.lower()
                 for c in s)
print(result)

s=input()
n=int(input())
s=s.lower()
ans=""
for i in range(len(s)):
    x=s[i]
    if(ord(x)<n+97):
        ans+=x.upper()
    else:
        ans+=x.lower()
print(ans)
